title: I feel sorry for Katarina...
body:
Her scar hasn't healed yet and I don't think it ever will...

Anyway, I feel scared to use Katarina now even though I got Warring Kingdoms recently and I really wanna play her...

The last time I played her her Q and R bugged out making them unusable and same as recall...
I really don't want that to happen again and now I'm traumatised by the experience...

replies.body: Yeah but what about the inability to recall either?? That one's the weirdest one of all...
I have to admit thats pretty weird! but try to video it, if you catch it on video then RIOT should have to investigate it.
